nodes.text: Sin'Dar was a Mirialan female merchant who worked on the grounds of House Organa, the estate of the noble House Organa on the planet Alderaan during the Cold War between the Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

Sin'Dar appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Mods Vendor for Republic players on Alderaan. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Sin'Dar was removed from the game along with the rest of the Mods Vendors. Her position is also marked on a map in Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, a game guide released by Prima Games.
